page.title: 03RECREATION 1
page.content: { BOWLS}2 plus players;8 balls plus small ball -"Jack". Jack rolled out & other balls rolled towards it. Nearest to jack wins. {TICK}6 plus players;1 person is "on" & throws ball & when it hits person that person is out. Continue until all out. Many variations eg. on bikes,on walls. {QUEENEO}Several players. 1 throws ball over head & someone hides it. Thrower guesses who has it. {SPEEDBALL}6 plus players. Throw ball against wall & if it hits person on rebound that person is out.Best done where there are 2/3 walls at angles as ball bounces fast & in different directions. {SPOT}Kicking a tennis ball against a wall. similar to speedball. {FOX & HOUND}A variation of "Hide & seek". Some hide & others try to find them. Many variations on this.
